definition: to return to one's original trade/to put (a business etc) under the administration of the relevant central authority/(the) relevant (department in charge of sth)

to return/to go back to/to give back to/(of a responsibility) to be taken care of by/to belong to/to gather together/(used between two identical verbs) despite/to marry (of a woman) (old)/division on the abacus with a one-digit divisor
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls

sentences.english: To administer centrally the law popularization and education in the customs institutions.
sentences.chinese: 歸口管理海關係統的普法教育。

sentences.english: The Manufacturing Department is responsible for the administrative management of product labels and traceability.
sentences.chinese: 製造部負責產品標識和可追溯性歸口管理。

sentences.english: To centralize the external communication and international cooperation affairs in the sector of securities and futures.
sentences.chinese: 歸口管理證券期貨行業的對外交往和國際合作事務。

sentences.english: XXVII. The foreign affairs should be under central management.
sentences.chinese: 第二十七條涉外事務歸口管理。

sentences.english: To manage unifiedly the foreign relationships and international cooperation affairs in respect of the administration of securities and futures markets.
sentences.chinese: 歸口管理證券期貨行業的對外交往和國際合作事務。

sentences.english: This standard is standardized by the Shandong Provincial Forestry Technical Committee.
sentences.chinese: 本標準由山東省林業標準化技術委員會歸口。

sentences.english: Planning the budget department returns a people the company plan management department management.
sentences.chinese: 計劃預算部歸口公司計劃經營部管理。

sentences.english: To administer the various business of the archives and chronicles center; to administer the confidential and communication office.
sentences.chinese: 領導部檔案史志中心業務，歸口管理部機要通信室。

sentences.english: The Human Resource & General Affair Department is responsible for the total management of training work.
sentences.chinese: 培訓工作由人力資源總務部歸口管理。
